dialog.line: Hey!
Come on! Get up!
That's good, really, that's very good!
You achieved to get up as a grown-up!
Mom is proud of you, huhu.
And yes, sweet pea, I'm your mommy, my name is Mwon Mwon the volcano!
Can you hear that mess, outside?
That's our signal, for... er...
Instead of looking each other straight in the eye, why don't we do some exercise, mh?
I'm sure you're excited to venture all around with your pretty brand new legs.
Therefore... let's do a small check-up, quickly.
You seem to be ready to jump in life, sweetheart.
Also, you got hidden gifts...
Everybody in the world is talented.
Look! One barbarous lad have tossed a... cracked musical device in your room... tsssk!
Are you able to morph in with the X button?
Neat! You are now disguised as a cracked musical device!
You know my child, your body is responsive to humancrafted props.
Now, can you morph out?
Ok ok, that would do the trick, I hope...
Listen boyo, wanna please Mom? I want you to do some "shopping" for me.
I need a bouncy thing, inflatable, nice and plumpy!
The perfect prop for games and sports, ok?
You'll see, we'll craft a nice prank, together.
The Mom and Son Prank!
Don't forget to say hi to your cousins, along the way.
Andandand this is very important.
If you're in trouble, stick with your cousins, ok?
Nothing is better than family to cure complaints and life disorder.
Gogogo, sweet pea! Hop in the hole!
Oh, you're so sweet, son!
That thing is cool, no lies.
You sure you cannot find a nice bouncy ball for your mum?
My faith in your skill is huuuuuge,
And my love for you is...
You can do it!
Just go plipploppin'the beach!
Oh magma god !
You're the sweetest of lava dots, son!
That plumpy beachball is just perfect to achieve...
In a couple of years of production, with... four more goons,
I'll craft you a formidable Mecha-Suit!
You'll crush that filthy vacation club!
That's all for today, son.
You can go back to the beach, if you want, to venture with your cousins.
Have you helped all of them?
I love you, son.
Aaaah... crimson skinned and leggy-jumpy,
You are my perfection, son.
Did you snatch a beachball for me?
No rush! Take your time!
You're born today, so...
